title: TdF 2023 Stage 1 Recon of the Final Kilometres + Taylor’s Bike Check [TtTT #2]
content:
We’re back with more 2023 Tour de France coverage from Safa. In this video, the team checks out the final kilometers of Stage 1’s finish and also takes a look at Taylor’s ultra-lightweight touring bike setup.

The post TdF 2023 Stage 1 Recon of the Final Kilometres + Taylor’s Bike Check [TtTT #2] appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
